}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Check Point L-50 - 8 Port Gigabit Firewall Appliance :CPAP-SG1120-FW
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6281 ARM v5 (@1.2GHz) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 512MB NAND Flash, SD Card Slot *Network: 12x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports
==Links of Interest== [https://www.cpug.org/forums/showthread.php/18672-Check-Point-1100-Appliance-FAQ User Group FAQ]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/check_point/check_point_l-50 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/check_point/l-50 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = kirkwood |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_xscale |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/dsl_modem DSL modem] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
